recipesJson.name: Scone'd
recipesJson.author: Nickevz
recipesJson.description:
classic British scone smeared with a bright strawberry Jam and finished off with a light vanilla whipped cream.

Created by myself, Nevans.

You can now get the one-shot at chefs flavours.

https://www.chefsflavours.co.uk/nick-n-mix-one-shots/6625-scone-d.html

reviews.text: Wow. Mixed this up a little over a week ago, and been knuckle tasting it every so often. Finally dripped some just now, and I’m really impressed. The knuckle taste was very strange and like floral. So I didn’t have the highest hopes. But when I vaped it, it’s amazing. A very buttery bakery type flavor. The jam is light and in the background. And I get just a touch of whipped cream. This is very different than what I’m used to in a good way. INW biscuit always has a weird off note to my palette but not in this recipe. Well done!
